backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing three UI colorâ€‘update features affecting IntroPage.tsx with metadata and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High-level text summaries of all frontend source files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining CSS variables, dark mode tokens, and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README-assets.md: Guide explaining how to replace background images and notes that music was removed.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with three routes and wraps them in an error boundary.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports paths to the three background images used by the pages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches errors and shows a refresh UI.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Empty placeholder file for future audio provider logic.
frontend/src/components/EnterWebsiteGate: Pre-entry screen with animated hearts and a button revealing the site.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Renders a full-screen letterboxed background image with a dark overlay.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: Reusable button component with wine-themed styling and size variants.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Simple layout wrapper that renders nested routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider implementing Internet Identity auth via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, defines color variables, custom fonts, and several animation keyframes used across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Displays the final message page with a background image, scrollable love letter text, and a styled signature.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Renders the intro screen with timed CTA reveal, styled text, and navigation to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Shows a proposal prompt with a YES button that navigates to the final page, using background and animations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, border radii, and animations sourced from CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known color-update issues, and feature requests for updating IntroPage colors.
